ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(bypass_last_claim_validation__c), Text(Activity_Path_Status__c) != 'New', Text(Activity_Path_Status__c) != 'Expired/Rejected/Cancelled', ISCHANGED(Activity_Path_Status__c), ( OR( $Profile.Name = 'PRM Partner Community User Login', $Profile.Name = 'PRM Partner Relationship Manager Login', $Profile.Name = 'Customers', $Profile.Name = 'Customers Login' ) ) )
